info.name: smooth fps
info.description:
white: instant fps.  Very noisy: many applications ( e.g. to stick to 60 fps ) require smoothing.
red: smooth timing ( iTimeDelta )       seems best
green: smooth fps ( 1. / iTimeDelta )  very sensitive to outliers, despite longer smoothing delay used.
